page.title: 14The Game of Girls Girls Out
page.content: "Girls,Girls,Out" is played on a two square by three square rectangle. Starting in the bottem left hand square and going anti-clockwise, the squares are lettered (G)irls, (B)oys (C)olours, (A)nimals, (F)ruit, and (C)ountries. One player then jumps on the square marked G and says, "Girls, girls, out.", and jumps out of the square. Then they jump back in the same square and shout, "Girls, girls." The player then jumps to the square marked B and says the name of a girl twice. The jumping continues anti clockwise shouting a different girl's name in each square until the player gets back to the start. The game starts again on the square marked B, and the call is for boy's names. The game continues with colours, animals, fruits and countries. The game stops when the players have had enough.
